first_para: Laura Jane Sandys (/ˈsændz/; born 5 June 1964) is a British Conservative Party politician. She served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Thanet between the 2010 UK general election and 2015.

full.extract:
Laura Jane Sandys (/ˈsændz/; born 5 June 1964) is a British Conservative Party politician. She served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for South Thanet between the 2010 UK general election and 2015.
Sandys stood down at the general election in 2015.
full.title: Laura Sandys
